@graph.headline: How to Move for Surfing in Dakar (Almadies): From AIBD to the Line-Up

mainEntity.name: How long does it take from AIBD to Almadies?

acceptedAnswer.text: Approximately 1 hour with light traffic and up to 2 hours with congestion, based on the author's experience.

mainEntity.name: Can I sort out a SIM at the airport (and still use WhatsApp)?

acceptedAnswer.text: Airport Wi-Fi usually supports WhatsApp on arrival. If you lack an international plan, disable roaming until you choose one. The author has used an Orange option around €30; details vary.

mainEntity.name: My surfboard didn’t arrive. What should I do?

acceptedAnswer.text: Wait at oversize. If the board is still missing after about one hour, obtain an official paper before leaving. Return daily to check; do not rely on a call and avoid delegating pickup to unknown third parties.
